about_the_game:
This Pack includes:

  • Tank Strv m/41-S/I (Rank 2 Sweden);

  • Fighter Fokker D.XXI (Rank 2 Sweden);

  • 120000 Silver Lions;

  • Premium Account for 7 days.

Strv m/41-S/I

A modified variant of the Czech LT vz. 38 light tank, produced under license by the Swedish Scania-Vabis company in the early 1940s.

It features 50 mm of armor on the hull and turret face along with impressive speed and mobility. As the Strv m/41 is a Rank II vehicle, it also has access to the scouting ability which allows you to mark enemy targets for your team. It’s equipped with the 37 mm m/38 cannon, with access to APHE and a very powerful sabot round with over 100mm of penetration! While APHE is great for explosive damage, the sabot will allow you to slice through even the toughest tanks at the rank with ease.

Fokker D.XXI

A Dutch aircraft developed for the Netherlands Air Force in the mid-1930s. Later on, Finland began to develop their own license-built versions with various differences.

This Fokker is a special Finnish variant with impressive performance. It offers a strong climb and fantastic turn rate, making it one of the most maneuverable monoplane fighters at its rank. What it lacks in speed, it makes up for in punch, with two FN-Browning 7.7 mm machine guns and two Oerlikon FF 20 mm cannons in the wings! With these, you’ll be more than equipped to bring down any fighter or bomber you come across, with its maneuverability helping you get behind a target effortlessly.

All premium vehicles allow you to earn increased Research Points and Silver Lions for each battle and comes furnished with all available modifications.

With a Premium account (also purchasable in the game for Golden Eagles) you will earn more Research Points and Silver Lions during each battle for a set amount of days. This is cumulative with bonuses from premium vehicles!

Note!

  • Refund is not provided if you purchase 2 different packs which include the same vehicle or you already have the vehicle from this pack!

  • Available for Linux, Windows and Mac only. You can't activate this item for the PSN or Xbox Live account.
detailed_description:
Note!

This product cannot be purchased for PlayStation® or Xbox accounts!

This DLC will only be granted to the Steam account that was used to make the purchase. If you have some issues, please contact our support (login on the website and use the "Submit a request" button at the top).


About the Game

This Pack includes:

  • Tank Strv m/41-S/I (Rank 2 Sweden);

  • Fighter Fokker D.XXI (Rank 2 Sweden);

  • 120000 Silver Lions;

  • Premium Account for 7 days.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Most modern 64bit Linux distributions
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 660 with latest proprietary drivers (not older than 6 months) / similar AMD with latest proprietary drivers (not older than 6 months; the minimum supported resolution for the game is 720p) with Vulkan support.
  • Hard Drive: 17 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 1060 with latest proprietary drivers (not older than 6 months) / similar AMD (Radeon RX 560) with latest proprietary drivers (not older than 6 months) with Vulkan support.
  • Hard Drive: 95 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Catalina v.10.15
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (Xeon processors not supported)
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Pro 5200 (Mac), or analog from AMD/Nvidia for Mac. Minimum supported resolution for the game is 720p with Metal support
  • Hard Drive: 17 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS Big Sur v. 10.16 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 (Xeon processors not supported)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Vega II or higher with Metal support.
  • Hard Drive: 95 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection

name: War Thunder - Swedish Starter Pack

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy War Thunder - Swedish Starter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1/8/10
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4GB (Windows Vista/7/8/10)
  • Graphics: DirectX 10.1 level video card: AMD Radeon 77XX / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660. The minimum supported resolution for the game is 720p.
  • Hard Drive: 17 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or Ryzen 5 3600 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 level video card or higher and drivers: Nvidia GeForce 1060 and higher, Radeon RX 570 and higher
  • Hard Drive: 95 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: The implacable Strv m/41 and maneuverable Fokker D.XXI with premium bonuses, 7 days of Premium account and Silver Lions - the best option for the early ranks of War Thunder!
supported_languages:
English*, German*, French*, Italian*, Spanish - Spain*, Simplified Chinese, Russian*, Japanese*, Polish*, Czech*, Turkish*, Portuguese - Portugal, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Ukrainian, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
